title: Immersion to Present at Upcoming Investor Conferences
text:
Submitted by admin on 8/31/2015 @ 1:15 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Immersion Corporation 
SAN JOSE, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Immersion Corporation (NASDAQ: IMMR), the leading developer and licensor of touch feedback technology, announced today that members of the executive management team will address the investment community at the following investor conferences: Brean Capital 2015 Global Technology Investor Conference Date: September 9, 2015 (One-on-one meetings only) Location: Millennium Broadway Hotel, New York, NY Craig-Hallum Capital Group 6 th Annual Alpha Select Conference Date: September 17, 2015 Time: 9:20am ET Location: Convene Conference Center, New York, NY 
The Craig-Hallum Conference audio webcast will be accessible on the "Events & Presentations" page of Immersion’s Investor Relations website at http://ir.immersion.com/events.cfm . 
About Immersion ( www.immersion.com ) 
Founded in 1993, Immersion (NASDAQ: IMMR) is the leading innovator in haptic technology. The company's touch feedback solutions deliver a more compelling sense of the digital world. Using Immersion's high-fidelity haptic systems, partners can transform user experiences with unique and customizable touch feedback effects; excite the senses in games and videos; restore "mechanical" feel by providing intuitive and unmistakable confirmation; may improve safety by reducing distractions while driving; provide realistic touch feedback when performing robotic medical procedures and training simulations; and expand usability when audio and visual feedback are ineffective. Immersion's technology, adopted in more than 3 billion digital devices, provides haptics in mobile phone and tablets, wearables, automotive, gaming, medical, and consumer electronics products from world-class companies. With over 2,000 issued or pending patents in the U.S., China and other countries, Immersion helps bring the digital universe to life. Learn more at www.immersion.com or www.touchsense.com .
